passive.name: IRON AMBASSADOR
passive.description:
(PASSIVE) IRON AMBASSADOR
                                Every 12 seconds (), Poppy's next attack throws her buckler, gaining 350 Attack Range and dealing 20 bonus magic damage ().The buckler ricochets off the target, landing nearby for 4 seconds. Poppy can pick it up to gain a shield that absorbs 86 damage (13% of max Health ) () for 3 second(s).If the buckler kills the target or if the target dies before being hit, it automatically returns to Poppy.
notes: Range and dealing 20 bonus magic damage ()

q.name: (Q) HAMMER SHOCK
q.description:
(Q) HAMMER SHOCK
 7/6/5/4s   30 
                                
                                
                                Poppy smashes the ground, dealing 50 (50/70/90/110 + 90% bonus ) plus 9% of the target's max Health as physical damage and making the ground unstable.The unstable area slows enemies by 25/30/35/40% and enemies and erupts after 1 seconds, dealing 50 (50/70/90/110 + 90% bonus ) plus 9% of the target's max Health as physical damage again.Poppy's percent health damage is capped against monsters at 40/100/160/220 damage per hit.

w.name: (W) STEADFAST PRESENCE
w.description:
(W) STEADFAST PRESENCE
 19/16.5/14/11.5s   40 
                                
                                
                                Passive: Gains 12% Armor  and 12% Magic Resist . This bonus doubles when Poppy is below 40% Health.Active: Gains 40% Movement Speed and projects a field around her for 2 seconds that stops enemy dashes. Enemies who are stopped by the field take 95 magic damage (95/140/185/230 + 70% ) and are grounded and slowed by 25% for 2 second(s).

e.name: (E) HEROIC CHARGE
e.description:
(E) HEROIC CHARGE
 13/12/11/10s   60 
                                
                                
                                Tackles an enemy, dealing 75 physical damage (75/100/125/150 + 50% bonus ) and carrying them forward.If Poppy tackles them into terrain, the target is stunned for 1.7/1.8/1.9/2 seconds and takes an additional 75 physical damage (75/100/125/150 + 50% bonus ).

r.name: (R) KEEPER'S VERDICT
r.description:
(R) KEEPER'S VERDICT
 90/80/70s   100 
                                
                                
                                Hold: Charges her hammer for up to 4 seconds, slowing herself by 15%.Release: Smashes the ground, creating a shockwave that deals 200 physical damage (200/300/400 + 90% bonus ) to the first enemy champion hit and nearby enemies, knocks them back toward their Nexus, and makes them untargetable while they fly. The range and knock back distance increase with charge duration.An uncharged smash deals 100 physical damage (100/150/200 + 45% bonus ) and knocks enemies airborne for 1 seconds.
notes: range and knock back distance increase with charge duration
